examples: The city centre has scarcely changed in over a century.

definitions.definition: a period of 100 years counted from what is believed to be the year of the birth of Jesus Christ:
examples: Rome was founded in the eighth century BC (= before Christ).

definitions.definition: a score of 100 runs in cricket
the time when one century ends and another begins:
examples: The museum reopened at the turn of the century.
